content: अंबिका {@--1@} A mother, good woman, also used like अंबा as a term of respect or endearment; अत्तिके अंबिके शृणु मम विज्ञप्तिं <ls>Mk. 1.</ls> {@--2@} <ab>N.</ab> of a plant (अंबा 2); of another plant कटुकी. {@--3@} <ab>N.</ab> of Pārvatī, wife of Śiva; आशीर्भिरेधयामासुः पुरः पाकाभिरंबिकां <ls>Ku. 6. 90.</ls> {@--4@} <ab>N.</ab> of the middle daughter of Kāśīrāja and the eldest wife of Vicitra-Vīrya. Like her youngest sister she had no progeny, and Vyāsa begot on her a son named धृतराष्ट्र.
